subject: Suits and Litigation
Football
Heatstroke
lead_paragraph: The widow of Minnesota Vikings lineman Korey Stringer reached a settlement with the N.F.L. regarding his death from heatstroke during training camp in 2001.
snippet: The widow of Minnesota Vikings lineman Korey Stringer reached a settlement with the N.F.L. regarding his death from heatstroke during training camp in 2001.
